typedef long long LL;

template<class T>T gcd(T a,T b){return (b==0)?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
template<class T>T lcm(T a,T b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
template<class T>T powmod(T a,T b) {T res=1;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;for(;b;b>>=1){if(b&1)res=res*a;if(res>=mod)res%=mod;a=a*a;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;}return res;}

int t,n,ans,dp[100005];
int solve(int n)
{
	if(n==1)
	return 1;
	if(n==2)
	return 2;
	if(n==3)
	return 2;
	if(n==4)
	return 3;
	if(dp[n]!=-1)
	return dp[n];
	int m=n/3;
	int r=n%3;
	if(r==1||r==2)
	{
		ans=2+max(solve(m),solve(m+1));
	}
	else ans=2+solve(m);
	return dp[n]=ans;
}
int main()
{
  SET(dp);
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
  	scanf("%d",&n);
  	printf("%d\n",solve(n));
  }
  return 0;
}
